name: Through the Lens
description:
Through the Lens is an exploration of difference. Watch your perspective change as you interact with the world. Watch your understanding of each element of this world become something different with every interaction. 

Development team

Nathan Viengkhou | Programming and building

Chloe McNamara-Bates | Texturing and audio design

Syhra Duazo | Texturing

Trish Huynh | 3D modelling

"Ambience, Peaceful Synth" background music by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org

Controls

WASD: Movement

Mouse: Look

Left mouse button/E: Interact
